sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; class Search extends React.Component { state = { search: '', type: 'false', typeStr: 'All' } handleKey = (event) => { if (event.key === 'Enter') { this.props.searchMovies(this.state.search) } } handleClick = () => { this.props.searchMovies(this.state.search) } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({type: event.target.checked}) this.setState({typeStr: event.target.value}) } render() { return
this.setState({ search: e.target.value })} onKeyDown={this.handleKey} />
} } export { Search }
